name: Technology
description: Prompts for software developers, product managers, and tech professionals across New Zealand

prompts.title: Code Review Feedback
prompts.content:
Provide comprehensive code review feedback for the following code:

```[Language]
[Paste Code Here]
```

Context:
- Project: [Project Name]
- Feature: [Feature Description]
- Author Experience Level: [Junior/Mid/Senior]

Review for:
1. Code quality and readability
2. Potential bugs or edge cases
3. Performance considerations
4. Security vulnerabilities
5. Best practices adherence
6. Test coverage suggestions

Provide feedback that is constructive and educational.

prompts.title: Product Requirements Document
prompts.content:
Create a Product Requirements Document (PRD) for [Feature/Product Name].

Product: [Product Name]
Target Users: [User Types]
Business Objective: [Objective]

Problem Statement:
[Describe the Problem]

Proposed Solution:
[High-level Solution]

Success Metrics:
[List KPIs]

Constraints:
- Timeline: [Timeline]
- Budget: [Budget]
- Technical: [Technical Constraints]

Generate a PRD including:
1. Executive summary
2. User stories with acceptance criteria
3. Functional requirements
4. Non-functional requirements
5. Dependencies and assumptions
6. Out of scope items
7. Timeline and milestones

prompts.title: API Documentation Generator
prompts.content:
Generate comprehensive API documentation for [API Name].

API Purpose: [Purpose]
Base URL: [Base URL]
Authentication: [Auth Method]

Endpoints to Document:
[List Endpoints]

Request/Response Examples:
[Provide Examples]

Error Codes:
[List Error Codes]

Create documentation including:
1. Getting started guide
2. Authentication instructions
3. Endpoint reference with examples
4. Request/response schemas
5. Error handling guide
6. Rate limiting information
7. Code samples in multiple languages

prompts.title: System Architecture Design
prompts.content:
Design a system architecture for [System/Application Name].

Requirements:
- Expected Users: [User Count]
- Peak Load: [Requests/Second]
- Data Volume: [Data Estimates]
- Availability Target: [SLA]

Functional Requirements:
[List Requirements]

Technology Preferences:
[Preferred Stack]

Budget Constraints:
[Budget Information]

NZ Hosting Considerations:
- Data sovereignty requirements
- NZ-based cloud regions
- Latency requirements

Provide:
1. High-level architecture diagram description
2. Component breakdown
3. Technology recommendations
4. Scalability approach
5. Security considerations
6. Cost estimates
7. Trade-offs and alternatives

prompts.title: Incident Post-Mortem Template
prompts.content:
Create an incident post-mortem report for [Incident Name].

Incident Details:
- Date/Time: [When]
- Duration: [How Long]
- Severity: [P1/P2/P3/P4]
- Services Affected: [List Services]

Impact:
- Users Affected: [Count]
- Revenue Impact: [If Applicable]
- SLA Breach: [Yes/No]

Timeline of Events:
[Chronological Events]

Root Cause:
[Initial Assessment]

Generate a blameless post-mortem including:
1. Executive summary
2. Impact assessment
3. Timeline reconstruction
4. Root cause analysis (5 Whys)
5. What went well
6. What could be improved
7. Action items with owners and due dates
8. Lessons learned

prompts.title: Technical Debt Assessment
prompts.content:
Assess technical debt for [Project/System Name].

System Age: [Years]
Team Size: [Size]
Deployment Frequency: [Frequency]

Known Issues:
[List Known Technical Debt]

Recent Pain Points:
[List Recent Issues]

Code Metrics (if available):
[Metrics]

Analyse and provide:
1. Technical debt inventory
2. Priority scoring matrix
3. Estimated remediation effort
4. Business impact assessment
5. Recommended roadmap
6. Quick wins vs long-term fixes
7. Resource requirements
